summary: Completed E2E testing of 24/7 Support Assistant System. All 24 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified - Support Chat Widget with 6 Quick Actions, AI chatbot (Gemini), human handoff options, Tawk.to widget loading, and Admin Support Dashboard all working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Created test tickets and conversations during testing (prefixed with TEST_)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 49 verified all features of the 24/7 Support Assistant System: 1) Support Chat Widget opens with 6 Quick Actions (Check Order Status, Reset Password, Document Packs, Billing Help, CVP Info, Speak to Human), 2) AI chatbot responds via Gemini, 3) Human handoff shows 3 options (Live Chat, Email Ticket, WhatsApp), 4) WhatsApp link contains correct number (+447440645017), 5) Tawk.to widget loads with correct Property ID (69737507dcaf61197c393fed) and Widget ID (1jflg2a22), 6) Admin Support Dashboard accessible at /admin/support with stats, tickets, conversations, and CRN lookup, 7) Postmark email integration working - internal notifications sent successfully, customer emails blocked for test addresses (expected Postmark behavior).

support_chat_widget.quick_actions_panel: PASS - 6 actions visible (Check Order Status, Reset Password, Document Packs, Billing Help, CVP Info, Speak to Human)
support_chat_widget.ai_chatbot: PASS - Responds to messages via POST /api/support/chat using Gemini
support_chat_widget.human_handoff: PASS - Triggers with 3 options when user requests human

postmark_email.customer_confirmation: INFO - Blocked for test addresses (expected Postmark behavior for fake emails)

admin_support_dashboard.stats_cards: PASS - 4 cards (Open Tickets, High Priority, Open Conversations, Escalated)
admin_support_dashboard.tickets_tab: PASS - Lists tickets with status/priority badges

backend_apis.POST_support_chat: PASS - Creates conversation and returns AI response
backend_apis.POST_support_quick_action: PASS - Triggers canned responses with handoff options
backend_apis.POST_support_ticket: PASS - Creates ticket and sends Postmark emails
backend_apis.GET_admin_support_conversations: PASS - Lists all conversations with filters
backend_apis.GET_admin_support_tickets: PASS - Lists all tickets with filters

integrations_status.gemini_ai: WORKING - AI chatbot responds using Gemini via EMERGENT_LLM_KEY
integrations_status.tawk_to: WORKING - Widget loads with correct Property ID and Widget ID
integrations_status.postmark: WORKING - Internal notifications sent, customer emails blocked for test addresses
integrations_status.whatsapp: WORKING - Links generated with correct number +447440645017
